reviewText: I guess you say, I am fantic about the Dallas series. I purchased the whole series. I was happy the "Dallas Movie The Early Years, came out. I had seen it before, one time,was played on TV. Now you can understand, from the begining. Its just GREAT!!A fabulous of cast, good acting!

This is actually a very good, quality film telling the story of what happened before Dallas.  It is really quite well done and enjoyable.  Unfortunately, if you're a big fan of the show there's a chance you might feel something is missing-without the actual cast of Dallas the show, it just doesn't really feel like something you want to watch more than once,as a history lesson.  However, a true fan won't miss it.
